column4: I am using the nvidia-glx-new driver with a Geforce fx 5500 and on my tv-out it only shows the top left corner of my screen (1024x768,  tv is supposed to be at 640x480).  how do i show the whole screen on my TV?  I have overscan set to zero
i believe there is a program called nvidia-settings that should be installed already... try using that
i've been there, there's nothing to adjust that makes it work
